description: Roasted onions, tomatillo, and tomatoes give this green salsa a deep, caramelized flavor.
name: Roasted Salsa Verde
recipeIngredient: 5 small tomatillos (paper removed (or substitute small green tomatoes)
4 medium green tomatoes (about 1 1/4 pounds, halved lengthwise)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400 F. Spray a baking sheet with canola oil. Place the vegetables on the baking sheet, cut sides of the tomatoes and onions up. Roast for 20 minutes. Remove the garlic and any vegetables that are brown, and turn the oven on broil. Broil until the vegetables become browned on top but do not burn. Watch closely and remove individual vegetables before they burn.
When all are browned, put them into a food processor and pulse to chop. Add the salt and lime juice and process until well blended. Serve with tortilla chips or on top of enchiladas or burritos.
